articles.content: "Dirty Dancing" star Jennifer Grey shared her thoughts on her ex-fiancé Johnny Depp's defamation trial against his ex-wife Amber Heard with Entertainment Tonight while promoting her memoir "Out Of Th… [+2175 chars]
